description: Implementation of the Raft consensus algorithm for the .NET Core platform. Development product of the Bachelor Final Project.
Web application functioning as a simulator of the Raft consensus algorithm using RaftCore. Development product of the Bachelor Final Project.
Command line application that connects to MyEpisodes.com to retrieve the shows followed by the user and then finds magnet links to download those episodes

Group project for the course "Web Information Retrieval & Data Mining". It uses information retrieval, machine learning and NPL techniques to obtain Twitter messages about a certain topic and predict their veracity.
Group project for the course "Software Architecture". Interactive citizen participation system leveraging NoSQL technology and Kafka.
